channel.title: Posts on The StoicJLM Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The StoicJLM Blog

item.title: This is the post title
item.description: This is some content class Solution: def myAtoi(self, s: str) -> int: # Step 1: Remove leading whitespace s = s.lstrip() if not s: return 0 # Step 2: Handle sign sign = 1 i = 0 if s[0] == '-': sign = -1 i += 1 elif s[0] == '+': i += 1 # Step 3: Convert digits to integer result = 0 while i < len(s) and s[i].isdigit(): result = result * 10 + int(s[i]) i += 1 # Step 4: Apply sign and handle 32-bit overflow result *= sign int_min, int_max = -2**31, 2**31 - 1 if result < int_min: return int_min elif result > int_max: return int_max else: return result
